title: calorimetric data
description: Data about calorimetric measurements or simulations, in particular, about energy fluxes.

calorimetric.title: The object is used to define calorimetric data.

id.description: The id represents a specific calorimetric data set.

name.description: If the calorimetric data set has a name, it can be indicated here.

description.description: This string can explain humans the calorimetric data set.

warnings.description: Some calorimetric data may easily be misinterpreted. The warnings contain critical information for users to avoid typical mistakes.

origin.description: For traceability, the origin of the data can be defined.

approvals.description: If the calorimetric data is approved by stakeholders, a signature can be provided.

createdAt.description: When the calorimetric data was created.

valid.description: From when and until when the data is valid.
